name: REI_NEXT_VISIT_PLAN_TESTS
description: List of the lab tests and procedures that a patient will return for in the next fertility appointment.

columns.name: CYCLE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the cycle record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: RETURN_TESTS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item contains the tests (fertility labs and ultrasound) that the patient will return for in the next visit.
